trans-unit.resname: This value is not a valid role.
trans-unit.source: This value is not a valid role.
trans-unit.target: El valor indicado no es un tipo de rol válido.

trans-unit.resname: End date must not be earlier then start date.
trans-unit.source: End date must not be earlier then start date.
trans-unit.target: La fecha de finalización no debe ser anterior a la de inicio.

trans-unit.resname: The begin date cannot be in the future.
trans-unit.source: The begin date cannot be in the future.
trans-unit.target: La fecha de inicio no puede estar en el futuro.

trans-unit.resname: The given value is not a valid time.
trans-unit.source: The given value is not a valid time.
trans-unit.target: El valor proporcionado no es una hora válida.

trans-unit.resname: You already have an entry for this time.
trans-unit.source: You already have an entry for this time.
trans-unit.target: Ya tiene un registro para esta hora.

trans-unit.resname: This period is locked, please choose a later date.
trans-unit.source: This period is locked, please choose a later date.
trans-unit.target: Este período está bloqueado; elija una fecha posterior.

trans-unit.resname: This invoice document cannot be used, please rename the file and upload it again.
trans-unit.source: This invoice document cannot be used, please rename the file and upload it again.
trans-unit.target: No se puede utilizar este documento de factura; cambie el nombre del archivo y cárguelo nuevamente.

trans-unit.resname: You must select at least one user or team.
trans-unit.source: You must select at least one user or team.
trans-unit.target: Debe seleccionar por lo menos un usuario o equipo.

trans-unit.resname: At least one team leader must be assigned to the team.
trans-unit.source: At least one team leader must be assigned to the team.
trans-unit.target: Debe asignarse al equipo al menos un responsable de equipo.

trans-unit.resname: The entered passwords don't match.
trans-unit.source: The entered passwords don't match.
trans-unit.target: Las contraseñas introducidas no coinciden.

trans-unit.resname: The email is already used.
trans-unit.source: This e-mail address is already in use.
trans-unit.target: Este correo electrónico está siendo usado.

trans-unit.resname: The username is already used.
trans-unit.source: The username is already used.
trans-unit.target: Este nombre de usuario ya está siendo utilizado.

trans-unit.resname: An equal username is already used.
trans-unit.source: An equal username is already used.
trans-unit.target: El mismo nombre de usuario ya está siendo usado.

trans-unit.resname: An equal email is already used.
trans-unit.source: An equal e-mail address is already in use.
trans-unit.target: El mismo correo ya está siendo usado.

trans-unit.resname: Duration cannot be zero.
trans-unit.source: Duration cannot be zero.
trans-unit.target: No se permite un valor vacío para la duración.

trans-unit.resname: The budget is completely used.
trans-unit.source: The budget is completely used.
trans-unit.target: El presupuesto se ha agotado. Del %budget% disponible, el %used% se ha reservado hasta ahora, el %free% aún puede utilizarse.

trans-unit.resname: Maximum duration of {{ value }} hours exceeded.
trans-unit.source: Maximum duration of {{ value }} hours exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Un número máximo {{ value }} de horas son permitidas.

trans-unit.resname: Sorry, the budget is used up.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, the budget is used up.
trans-unit.target: Lo siento, el presupuesto se ha agotado.

trans-unit.resname: An activity needs to be selected.
trans-unit.source: An activity needs to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Hay que seleccionar una actividad.

trans-unit.resname: A project needs to be selected.
trans-unit.source: A project needs to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Es necesario seleccionar un proyecto.

trans-unit.resname: This timesheet is already exported.
trans-unit.source: This timesheet is already exported.
trans-unit.target: Esta hoja de horas ya se ha exportado.

trans-unit.resname: Validation Failed
trans-unit.source: Validation Failed
trans-unit.target: Hubo un problema al guardar.

trans-unit.resname: Cannot stop running timesheet
trans-unit.source: Cannot stop running timesheet
trans-unit.target: Tiene una entrada de tiempo activa que no se puede detener automáticamente.

trans-unit.resname: This value is not a valid role name.
trans-unit.source: This value is not a valid role name.
trans-unit.target: Este no es un nombre válido para un rol de usuario.

trans-unit.resname: The given code is not the correct TOTP token.
trans-unit.source: The given code is not the correct TOTP token.
trans-unit.target: El código ingresado no es el símbolo TOTP correcto.

trans-unit.resname: This is a public holiday, booking not allowed.
trans-unit.source: This is a public holiday, booking not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Es un día festivo, no se admiten reservas.

trans-unit.resname: You do not have enough overtime, remaining are {{ value }}.
trans-unit.source: You do not have enough overtime, remaining are {{ value }}.
trans-unit.target: No tiene suficientes horas extra, las restantes son {{ value }}.

trans-unit.resname: An absence cannot be booked before your first working day.
trans-unit.source: An absence cannot be booked before your first working day.
trans-unit.target: No se puede reservar una ausencia antes del primer día laborable.

trans-unit.resname: Not enough holidays left.
trans-unit.source: Not enough holidays left.
trans-unit.target: No quedan vacaciones.

trans-unit.resname: An absence must have a date.
trans-unit.source: An absence must have a date.
trans-unit.target: Las ausencias deben tener una fecha.

trans-unit.resname: You can book a maximum of {{ value }} days at once.
trans-unit.source: You can book a maximum of {{ value }} days at once.
trans-unit.target: Puede reservar un máximo de {{ value }} días a la vez, actualmente ha seleccionado {{ selected }}.

trans-unit.resname: This absence type is not known.
trans-unit.source: This absence type is not known.
trans-unit.target: Se desconoce este tipo de ausencia.

trans-unit.resname: An absence must be assigned to a user.
trans-unit.source: An absence must be assigned to a user.
trans-unit.target: Se debe asignar una ausencia a un usuario.

trans-unit.resname: You cannot have two absences of this type at one day.
trans-unit.source: You cannot have two absences of this type at one day.
trans-unit.target: No se pueden tener dos ausencias de este tipo en un mismo día.

trans-unit.resname: The chosen date is not a working day.
trans-unit.source: The chosen date is not a working day.
trans-unit.target: La fecha elegida no es un día laborable.

trans-unit.resname: The chosen date is already locked.
trans-unit.source: The chosen date is already locked.
trans-unit.target: La fecha elegida ya está cerrada.

trans-unit.resname: The period of absence must not extend beyond the turn of the year.
trans-unit.source: The period of absence must not extend beyond the turn of the year.
trans-unit.target: El periodo de ausencia no debe prolongarse más allá del cambio de año.

trans-unit.resname: The CSRF token is invalid. Please try to resubmit the form.
trans-unit.source: The CSRF token is invalid. Please try to resubmit the form.
trans-unit.target: Por favor, intenta volver a enviar el formulario. Si el problema persiste, actualiza tu navegador.
